text: Barney Martin (March 3, 1923 - March 21, 2005) was an American actor and comedian. He is best known for playing Morty Seinfeld, father of Jerry, on the famous sitcom Seinfeld. Martin was born on March 3, 1923 in Queens, New York to an Irish-Catholic family. Martin died on March 21, 2005 in his home in Studio City, California from lung cancer, aged 82. ==References== ==Other websites== *Obituary for Barney Martin in The New York Times * * Category:1923 births Category:2005 deaths Category:Actors from New York City Category:American movie actors Category:American radio actors Category:American radio personalities Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American television personalities Category:American voice actors Category:Comedians from New York City Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Seinfeld
title: Barney Martin
